analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#441-455) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#452)

BigTokenCrowdSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#721-743) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#736)

BigTokenCrowdSale.finalization (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#785-812) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(owner,remainingTokens) (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#800)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#804)

BigTokenCrowdSale.runPreMint (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#877-880) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(reservedAddr,reservedAmount) (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol)

Reentrancy in BigTokenCrowdSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#721-743):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(validPurchase()) (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#727-728)
	- token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#736)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- numberOfPurchasers (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#740-742)
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/8/0x2f4330e833c76860ea54f15b0195ff80a2c519c4.sol#739)
